review_data.title: Super
review_data.content: A Brand New Greek Bistro Wine Bar, With More Than Friendly Staff And The Owners Petros & Dimitris Are Strictly Educated In This Field !!!

review_data.title: Mediterranen food and Greek wine
review_data.content: Yamas is a new bar/restaurant located at Europaallee next to Zürich main station. They serve a variety of Greek and Mediterranean food like bruschetta, octopus, tadziki, moussaka and pinchos. The food is good and the atmosphere in the restaurant is nice and friendly.
